```{r}
#| label: knitr_init

## Load libraries
library(knitr)
library(rmdformats)
library(fontawesome)

## Global options
options(
  max.print = "75"
  )

# Chunk options
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
	cache = TRUE,
  prompt = FALSE,
  tidy = TRUE,
  comment = NA,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE)

opts_knit$set(
  width = 75
  )
```

This is the landing space for the websites and GitHub repos of the courses Andy teaches, including:

- _EPsy 3264: Basic &amp; Applied Statistics_
- _EPsy 8251: Methods in Data Analysis for Educational Research I_
- _EPsy 8252: Methods in Data Analysis for Educational Research II_
- _EPsy 8264: Advanced Multiple Regression_
